summary: Completed all remaining tasks from the Beauty Booking module review plan. Reviewed and confirmed all migrations have proper indexes and default values. Registered BeautyBookingDatabaseSeeder in DatabaseSeeder. Verified controller imports are correct - controllers use Helpers::upload() directly for file uploads (which is acceptable) and BeautyPushNotification trait is already being used where needed. Confirmed middleware registration (vendor.api and module-check) in Kernel.php. All migrations have comprehensive indexes for frequently queried columns. All enum and boolean columns have default values. No linter errors found. All TODO items from the plan are now completed.
current_status: All tasks from the Beauty Booking module review and bug fixing plan have been completed. The module is now ready for testing. Key accomplishments: 1) All migrations reviewed and confirmed to have proper indexes and default values, 2) Seeder registered in DatabaseSeeder, 3) Controller imports verified, 4) Middleware registration confirmed, 5) Traits (BeautyPushNotification) are being used appropriately, 6) No linter errors. The module structure follows Laravel best practices and is consistent with the Rental module patterns.
